(2x) + 15 = y   // Henry actually made (2x) + 15 cookies this year.

Last year, Henry had 5818183 cookies left over after baking. We don't know how many cookies he made last year or how many he made this year, but we know that when he finished baking this year, he had (2x) + 15 cookies left over. We also know that the total number of cookies he ever made is all the cookies he made last year plus all the cookies he made this year. Let's call that z. Here's what that looks like mathematically:

z = x + (2x) + 15     // Total number of cookies Henry ever made equals the number
